thread.section_title: The Knife Merchant, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Knife Merchant, Inc | www.knifemerchant.com
thread.title: Steven
thread.title_full: The Knife Merchant, Inc reviewed by Steven

author: Steven
title: Steven
text: I needed sheaths for kitchen knives to live in a drawer my RV. I found these and they fit the bill perfectly. While I found a vendor with cheaper prices on the net, their shipping was exorbitantly high so The Knife Merchant had a lower bottom line when you include shipping. Product was as described and was shipped quickly. Very satisfied!
